thread.title: Report: Kristen Stewart ends affair with former personal assistant Alicia Cargile
thread.title_full: Report: Kristen Stewart ends affair with former personal assistant Alicia Cargile | DailyTelegraph

author: Network writers
title: Report: Kristen Stewart ends affair with former personal assistant Alicia Cargile
text:
KRISTEN Stewart has reportedly ended her romance with her former assistant Alicia Cargile.
According to RadarOnline the breakup was amicable. A source told the website the pair had “mutually decided to split and it was definitely an amicable breakup”.
A Crazy Gun Fight In 'American Ultra' Clip 0:52 A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.
January 1st 1970 46 years ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/Celebrity/ Stewart, who split from longtime boyfriend Robert Pattinson, after she was caught cheating has never confirmed the relationship with Cargile, a Los Angeles-based visual effects producer. Although the two were pictured kissing on a beach in Hawaii in January this year.
When asked about speculation that she was bisexual she refused to confirm the rumours, saying, “Google me, I’m not hiding.”
Ex-lovers ... Stewart split with Twilight co-star Robert Pattinson in 2013. Picture: Ian Gavan/Getty Images. Stewart, 25, whose most recent movie American Ultra with Jessie Eisenberg came out in Australia last month, split with Twilight co-star Pattinson in 2013 after photos emerged of her cosying up to Snow White and the Huntsman director Rupert Sanders.
“Kristen is just so busy right now that she does not have the time to be in a serious relationship,” the source told RadarOnline .
 Rumoured lovers ... Kristen Stewart and director Rupert Sanders attending the |Snow White and the Huntsman| screening in Los Angeles. Picture: Jordan Strauss/AP. Originally published as Stewart ends affair with ‘girlfriend’
